welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Cookstown, a charming town in the heart of Northern Ireland known for its rich history and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore our beautiful streets, taste our local cuisine, and soak up the unique culture that makes Cookstown a must-visit destination. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Aldergrove International Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Aldergrove International Airport is responsible for handling all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ballykelly Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Ballykelly Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
